entities.name: PartyMergeHistory
entities.description: History of party merges in the MDM system

attributes.name: party_merge_id
attributes.description: Unique identifier for this merge record

attributes.name: survivor_party_id
attributes.description: ID of the surviving party

attributes.name: merged_party_id
attributes.description: ID of the merged party

attributes.name: merge_date
attributes.description: Date and time when the merge occurred

attributes.name: merge_reason
attributes.description: Reason for the merge

attributes.name: merge_score
attributes.description: Confidence score for the merge

attributes.name: merge_rule
attributes.description: Rule used for the merge

attributes.name: approved_by
attributes.description: User who approved the merge

attributes.name: approval_date
attributes.description: Date and time when the merge was approved

attributes.name: merged_record_json
attributes.description: JSON representation of the merged record

attributes.name: status
attributes.description: Current status of the merge

attributes.name: created_at
attributes.description: Date and time when this record was created

attributes.name: created_by
attributes.description: User who created this record

entities.name: PartyMatchRule
entities.description: Rules for matching parties in the MDM system

attributes.name: match_rule_id
attributes.description: Unique identifier for this match rule

attributes.name: rule_name
attributes.description: Name of the match rule

attributes.name: rule_description
attributes.description: Description of the match rule

attributes.name: rule_type
attributes.description: Type of match rule

attributes.name: rule_definition
attributes.description: Definition of the match rule in JSON format

attributes.name: threshold
attributes.description: Threshold for considering a match

attributes.name: priority
attributes.description: Priority of this rule in the matching hierarchy

attributes.name: party_type
attributes.description: Type of party this rule applies to

attributes.name: is_active
attributes.description: Flag indicating if this rule is active

attributes.name: created_at
attributes.description: Date and time when this record was created

attributes.name: updated_at
attributes.description: Date and time when this record was last updated

attributes.name: created_by
attributes.description: User who created this rule

attributes.name: updated_by
attributes.description: User who last updated this rule
